Package spring.service

Class ServiceFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • spring.service.ServiceFacade
  • @Service("serviceFacade")
public class ServiceFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    Facade for managing the IdeaService, UserService, VoteService, DevelopmentService, and CommentService.
    Author:
    Shane Lockwood

        public void createIdea​(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       java.lang.String username)
        Creates and saves an Idea.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession representing the session.
        title - The String representing the idea's title.
        description - The String representing the idea's description.
        username - The String representing the associated User's username.

      • createDevelopment

        public void createDevelopment​(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                              java.lang.String link,
                              java.lang.String username)
        Creates and saves a Development. If a Development with the same associated Idea and User exists, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession representing the session.
        link - The String representing the session.
        username - The String representing the User's username.

      • createComment

        Creates and saves a Comment.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession representing the session.
        username - The String representing the User's username.
        comment - The String representing the comment.

      • createIdeaVote

        public void createIdeaVote​(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                           java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.Boolean upVote,
                           int ideaId)
        Creates and saves an @{link spring.model.IdeaVote}.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession representing the session.
        username - The String representing the User's username.
        upVote - The boolean representing the vote status.
        ideaId - The int representing the Idea's id.

        username - The String representing the User's username.
        upVote - The boolean representing the vote status.
        developmentId - The int representing the Development's id.
